metadata.Title: CVE-2020-36646 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: A vulnerability classified as problematic has been found in MediaAreaZenLib up to 0.4.38. This affects the functionZtring::Date_From_Seconds_1970_Local of the file Source/ZenLib/Ztring.cpp.The manipulation of the argument Value leads to unchecked return value tonull pointer dereference. Upgrading to version 0.4.39 is able to addressthis issue. The identifier of the patch is6475fcccd37c9cf17e0cfe263b5fe0e2e47a8408. It is recommended to upgrade theaffected component. The identifier VDB-217629 was assigned to thisvulnerability.

criterions.comment: libzen: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
